Great, now Jerry the beaver has to fix the Space Time Thingy-Ma-Wotsit.
The first half of the day before I get a follow back on my way home from work to be the first half of the year.
OBEY.

My turtle swims sideways...

DO YOU KNOW WHO I AM?

Let's see...

My calculator george2 says the following:

╤◙ÿ║=▄╥u█2ä4═<@¢æÜ╬lΘ╧µ═╟Å¬è

Interestingly enough, Alt-codes don't work with powers of 2 greater than 8. This makes perfect sense, as such codes are equivalent to Alt-0, which does not exist, due to the size of a byte.
Tuesdays!
Can jet fuel really melt steel panels? Find out on the next episode of R.I.P Harambe! Airing this 9/11 at a local North Tower near you.
Yay ULA!

Hoooooooooooo

heyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy
Welcome back to ScienceAlert nation and let's get riiiiight into the physics!

This is who we are. This is who I am. And if you think you can stop me then you better think again. Because I have a feeling..that I will never end! I won't let you hurt my planet, I won't let you hurt my friends.
